meanings.definition: Differing from each other or from a standard
meanings.sent1: The two friends had diverging opinions on the movie.
meanings.sent2: The diverging paths of the hikers led to different destinations.
meanings.sent3: The diverging tastes of the siblings made grocery shopping an adventure.
meanings.sent4: Their diverging paths in life eventually brought them back together.
meanings.sent5: The diverging colors of the sunset painted the sky in a beautiful array.

meanings.definition: Moving or extending in different directions
meanings.sent1: The diverging roads confused the travelers.
meanings.sent2: The diverging arrows on the signpost pointed to various locations.
meanings.sent3: The diverging dance moves of the performers captivated the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like diverging rivers, flowing in separate directions.
meanings.sent5: The diverging flight paths of the birds created a mesmerizing pattern in the sky.
